message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $15,000. I'm confident you'll love it!

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $18,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now. I'm willing to pay $15,500 for the product. This is a fair price, considering its value to you and my budget. Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still a bit above your offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $16,750. This is a reasonable compromise, considering the product's value to you and my initial offer. Let me know what you think.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16,750 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $16,000. This is a fair price, and it's closer to my budget. Let me know if you're open to it.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $16,250. This is a final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. If you're interested, let me know, otherwise, I'll consider other options.
